dependencies.description:
The deprecation library provides a deprecated decorator and a
fail_if_not_removed decorator for your tests.
dependencies.name: py-deprecation

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: A custom widget for returning mouse and keyboard events to Python.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyevents

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter widgets based on vuetify UI components which implement Google's
Material Design Spec with the Vue.js framework.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyvuetify

dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server

dependent_to.description: MathJax resources as a Jupyter Server Extension.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server-mathjax

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter Server Proxy lets you run arbitrary external processes (such as
RStudio, Shiny Server, Syncthing, PostgreSQL, Code Server, etc)
alongside your notebook server and provide authenticated web access to
them using a path like /rstudio next to others like /lab.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server-proxy

dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab

dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts
dependent_to.name: py-jupytext

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook as a Jupyter Server Extension.
dependent_to.name: py-nbclassic

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter widget to interactively view molecular structures and
trajectories.
dependent_to.name: py-nglview

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
